definition: Renai or Jenai district of Keelung City 基隆市[Ji1 long2 shi4], Taiwan/Renai or Jenai township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
Jenai district of Keelung City 基隆市[Ji1 long2 shi4], Taiwan
Renai or Jenai township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan

sentences.english: But do you imagine that I shall leave Catherine to his duty and humanity?
sentences.chinese: 可是你以爲我就會把凱瑟琳交給他的責任和仁愛嗎？

sentences.english: Grace is like a paradise in blessings, and mercy remaineth for ever.
sentences.chinese: 仁愛有如蒙受祝福的花園，慈善永遠常存。

sentences.english: She pursues the love boldly, has feelings of kind-heartedness.
sentences.chinese: 她大膽地追求愛情，有着仁愛的情懷。

sentences.english: In fact, universal love and caring, are worthy of our cherished ideas.
sentences.chinese: 其實兼愛與仁愛一樣，都是值得我們珍視的思想。

sentences.english: We must not respond to an overemphasis on divine love by denying that God is love.
sentences.chinese: 我們絕不能夠過分強調聖愛而否認上帝的仁愛。

sentences.english: Destroy or trying to destroy the "kindheartedness".
sentences.chinese: 破壞或試圖毀滅了“仁愛”。

sentences.english: That is the second level of humaneness, and is in accord with principle.
sentences.chinese: 這是仁愛的第二層發揮，合理合宜。

sentences.english: Jean Valjean's manners were more tender and more paternal than ever.
sentences.chinese: 冉阿讓的態度比以往任何時候都更象慈父，更加仁愛。

sentences.english: Through the practice of the quality of loving kindness and non-violence we can help others.
sentences.chinese: 同過修持仁愛與非暴力的功德，我們可以幫助別人。

sentences.english: It is a pity that there should be so little charity abroad.
sentences.chinese: 外間竟然這麼缺少仁愛，這是很可惜的。

sentences.english: Do the kindheartedness of ConfucianSchool really exist in every scholar's heart?
sentences.chinese: 儒家的仁愛之學真的存在與每一個讀書人心理嗎？

sentences.english: As exactness is kindness, he was exact.
sentences.chinese: 因爲守時是一種仁愛，他總是守時的。

sentences.english: Kindness and understanding will often draw a boy unburden his conscience .
sentences.chinese: 仁愛和理解常會使得男孩吐露真情，解除良心的負擔。

sentences.english: There is great humanity in all the writings of Tolstoy.
sentences.chinese: 托爾斯泰所有的作品都充滿了偉大的仁愛。

sentences.english: Deliberate little concussion more, many kindness to fellowmen little old grudge, the life just becomes more beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 多思索少激動，多仁愛少仇恨，人生才變得更加美麗。

sentences.english: Upholding kindheartedness is a good moral tradition of the Chinese nation.
sentences.chinese: 崇尚仁愛，是中華民族的優良道德傳統。

definition: Bo'ai county in Jiaozuo 焦作[Jiao1 zuo4], Henan
a sage/wise and holy man/virtuous ruler/Buddhist lama/wine
to show concern and care for
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
care/solicitude/to show care for/concerned about/attentive to
to offer respectfully/to consecrate/to dedicate/to devote
one's bosom (the seat of emotions)/breast/broad-minded and open/to think about/to cherish
